org.jfree.data.xy

Interface XYDatasetSelectionState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DatasetSelectionState
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHighLowDataset, SimpleHistogramDataset, TimeSeriesCollection, XYSeriesCollection

    public interface XYDatasetSelectionState
extends DatasetSelectionState
    Returns information about the selection state of items in an XYDataset. Classes that implement this interface must also implement PublicCloneable to ensure that charts and datasets can be correctly cloned. Likewise, classes implementing this interface must also implement Serializable.

    The selection state might be part of a dataset implementation, or it could be maintained in parallel with a dataset implementation that doesn't directly support selection state.
    Since:
    1.2.0

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearSelection()
      Clears all selected items.
      void fireSelectionEvent()
      Send an event to registered listeners to indicate that the selection has changed.
      int getItemCount(int series)
      Returns the number of items within the specified series.
      int getSeriesCount()
      Returns the number of series.
      boolean isSelected(int series, int item)
      Returns true if the specified item is selected, and false otherwise.
      void setSelected(int series, int item, boolean selected)
      Sets the selection state for an item in the dataset.
      void setSelected(int series, int item, boolean selected, boolean notify)
      Sets the selection state for the specified item and, if requested, fires a change event.
